europeana:record.dc:title: A revision of the subtribe Brulleiina van Achterberg (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Helconinae) from China
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Chen X.
He J.
Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Helconinae; Brulleiina; Brulleia; Parabrulleia; new species; key; distribution; Oriental; Palaearctic; China
europeana:record.dc:description: The species of the genera Brulleia Szepligeti, 1904, and Parabrulleia van Achterberg, 1983, of the subtribe Brulleiina van Achterberg (Braconidae: Helconinae) from China are revised and keyed. Ten species are recognized, and all nine Brulleia species are new to science. Xuexin Chen & Junhua He, Institute of Applied Entomology, Zhejiang Agricultural University, Hangzhou 310029, China.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A revision of the subtribe Brulleiina van Achterberg (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Helconinae) from China (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 28)
